name: Elon Musk
description: Elon Reeve Musk FRS (/i:ion/; born June 28, 1971) is a technology entrepreneur, investor, and engineer. He holds South African, Canadian, and U.S. citizenship and is the founder, CEO, and lead designer of SpaceX; co-founder, CEO, and product architect of Tesla, Inc.; co-founder and CEO of Neuralink; founder of The Boring Company; co-founder and co-chairman of OpenAl; and co-founder of PayPal. As of February 2021, Musk's net worth stands at $184 billion, making him the 2nd richest person in the world
